title: Frontend Engineer
description: Build modern web apps with React, implement responsive UI, and collaborate with designers to create accessible interfaces.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Design scalable APIs and databases, optimize performance and reliability, and work on microservices architecture.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Work across frontend and backend to deliver end-to-end features using React and Node.js.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze business data, create dashboards, and provide actionable insights using SQL and Python.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Maintain CI/CD pipelines, automate deployments, and ensure reliability of cloud infrastructure.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Build and productionize ML models, work with large datasets, and collaborate with data scientists.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design user-centered interfaces, produce prototypes, and conduct usability testing.

title: QA Engineer
description: Implement automated test suites, validate releases, and ensure product quality.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Develop native and cross-platform mobile applications with a focus on performance and UX.

title: Product Manager
description: Lead product strategy, prioritize roadmap, and work closely with engineering and design teams.

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description: Improve system reliability, implement monitoring, and respond to incidents.

title: AI Researcher
description: Research novel ML architectures, publish papers, and prototype research ideas.
